import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react" import "./TweetList.css" import { connect } from "react-redux" import moment from "moment" import { tweetActions } from "../../action/tweet" import AuthContext from "../../util/AuthContext" import InfiniteScroll from "react-infinite-scroll-component" function TweetList(props) { const [tweetList, setTweetList] = useState() const [likeCounter, setLikeCounter] = useState() const { currentUser } = useContext(AuthContext) useEffect(() => { const onLoadTweetList = () => { setTweetList(props.tweet_payload) } onLoadTweetList() }, [props.tweet_payload]) const handleLikeCounter = (tweet_id) => { const data = tweetList.filter((list) => list._id === tweet_id) setLikeCounter(data[0].likes + 1) const payload = { likes: likeCounter, _id: tweet_id, } props.dispatch(tweetActions.likeTweet(payload)) } const handleRemoveTweet = (id) => { try { props.dispatch(tweetActions.removeTweet(id)) } catch (error) { console.log(error.message) } } const fetchMoreData = () => { setTweetList(tweetList.concat(Array.from({ length: 2 }))) } return (
Loading...} scrollableTarget="scrollable" > {tweetList.map((tweet, index) => (
  • {tweet.username}
    {moment(tweet.createdAt) .startOf("days") .fromNow()}
    {currentUser._id === tweet.user_id ? (
    ) : ( "" )}

    {tweet.tweet_body}

    {tweet.likes} like(s)
    {tweet.comments.length}{" "} comments
    Comment
    Retweet
    • ))}
    ) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { tweet_payload: state.tweets, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(TweetList)
